Detailed Description

Makes this matrix a direction cosine matrix.

01044         double sx, sy, sz;
01045         double cx, cy, cz;
01046 
01047         // Check size of square matrix is valid
01048         if (getRows() != 3) {
01049                 error("Cannot compute direction cosine matrix for a matrix without 3 rows and columns\n");
01050                 m_thisMatrix->zero();
01051                 //return *this;
01052         }
01053 
01054         // Calculate sines and cosines
01055         sx = sin(phi);
01056         sy = sin(theta);
01057         sz = sin(psi);
01058         cx = cos(phi);
01059         cy = cos(theta);
01060         cz = cos(psi);
01061 
01062         // Set the elements of the matrix
01063         element(0,0) = cy*cz;
01064         element(0,1) = cy*sz;
01065         element(0,2) = -sy;
01066 
01067         element(1,0) = sx*sy*cz-cx*sz;
01068         element(1,1) = sx*sy*sz+cx*cz;
01069         element(1,2) = sx*cy;
01070 
01071         element(2,0) = cx*sy*cz+sx*sz;
01072         element(2,1) = cx*sy*sz-sx*cz;
01073         element(2,2) = cx*cy;
01074 
01075         // Return a reference to ourselves
01076         //return *this;
01077 }
